original: paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo
analyzed: paṭicca na parittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca na appamāṇaḥ
translated: there arises a limited idea due to a cause condition. With an exalted idea as condition, there arises a immeasurable idea due to a cause condition.

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto ca naappamāṇo
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca na parittaḥ ca na appamāṇaḥ
translated: A great thing arises with a condition of root cause.🔽A limited and a great thing arise with a condition of root cause.🔽A great and a limited thing arise with a condition of root cause.

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca na mahaggataḥ ca na appamāṇaḥ
translated: An immeasurable thing arises with a condition of root cause.

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ🔽paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca na appamāṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā appamāṇam dhamma  paṭicca na parittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca na mahaggataḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca na mahaggataḥ ca na appamāṇaḥ
translated: A limited thing arises with a condition of root cause.🔽A great thing arises with a condition of root cause.

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto ca namahaggato🔽ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca na parittaḥ ca na mahaggataḥ  ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: A great and an immeasurable thing arise with a condition of root cause.🔽A limited and an immeasurable thing arise with a condition of root cause.

original: Parittañca appamāṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: parittam ca appamāṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na mahaggataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: A great and a limited and an immeasurable thing arise with a condition of root cause.

original: Parittañca appamāṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Parittañca🔽appamāṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Parittañca
analyzed: parittam ca appamāṇañca dhammam paṭicca na appamāṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā parittam ca  appamāṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na mahaggataḥ ca na appamāṇaḥ ca dhammāḥ uppajjanti hetu paccayā  parittam ca mahaggatam ca dhammam paṭicca na parittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā parittam ca
translated: Dependent on a limited and a boundless state there arises a boundless state …🔽Dependent on a limited and a boundless state there arise a great and a boundless state …

original: mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Parittañca🔽mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Parittañca🔽mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: mahaggatam ca dhammam paṭicca na mahaggataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā parittam ca  mahaggatam ca dhammam paṭicca na appamāṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā parittam ca  mahaggatam ca dhammam paṭicca na parittaḥ ca na appamāṇaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: Dependent on a limited and a great state there arises a limited state …🔽Dependent on a limited and a great state there arises a great state …🔽Dependent on a limited and a great state there arises a boundless state …

original: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti🔽hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: parittam ca mahaggatam ca dhammam paṭicca na mahaggataḥ ca na appamāṇaḥ ca dhammāḥ uppajjanti 🔽hetu paccayā
translated: Dependent on a limited and a great state there arise a limited and a boundless state …🔽Dependent on a limited and a great state there arise a great and a boundless state …

original: Hetuyā tevīsa, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa …pe… aññamaññe soḷasa …pe… purejāte āsevane nava …pe… avigate tevīsa. (Sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā tevīsa ārammaṇe cuddasa adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa pe aññamaññe soḷasa pe purejāte āsevane nava pe avigate tevīsa sabbattha vitthāretabba
translated: Twenty-three by way of cause, fourteen by way of object, nineteen by way of predominance … sixteen by way of association … nineteen by way of presence … nineteen by way of non-disappearance.
